articles.content: Former US soccer team goaltender Hope Solo was arrested for allegedly driving while intoxicated and resisting arrest in North Carolina, and police say her two-year-old twins were in the vehicle when … [+10325 chars]

articles.author: Jack Gaughan
articles.title: Ruben Dias RULED OUT of Manchester City's crunch Premier League title clash against Liverpool - Daily Mail
articles.description: Pep Guardiola has ruled Ruben Dias out of Manchester City's crunch title clash with Liverpool. The defender has not played since suffering a hamstring injury in the FA Cup win at Peterborough.
articles.content:
Pep Guardiola has ruled Ruben Dias out of Manchester City's crunch title clash with Liverpool.
